story.title: My House
story.help:
There is a safe in the master bedroom, and you need to find the code! Type a direction (left, right, up or down) to go there, or type 'take' to enter take mode.
Type 'inv' to check inventory, type 'look' to look. Type 'talk' to talk.
Type 'clear' to clear screen.

Type 'quit' to quit at any time.

main.message:
This is the living room.
To the left is the master bedroom, to the right is the dining room. Up is the hallway.

Hallway.message:
This is the hallway.
Down is the living room, to the left is the bathroom. Up is the boy's room, right is the girl's room.

Girls_room.message:
This is the girl's room.
To the left is the hallway.

Boys_room.message:
This is the boy's room.
Down is the hallway.

Bathroom.message:
This is the bathroom.
To the right is the hallway.

Master_room.message:
This is the master bedroom.
To the right is the living room.

Dining_room.message:
This is the dining room.
To the left is the living room, to the right is the kitchen.

Kitchen.message:
This is the kitchen.
To the left is the dining room, down is the laundry room.

Laundry_room.message:
This is the laundry room.
Up is the kitchen, down is the backyard.

Backyard.message:
This is the backyard.
Up is the laundry room.

Lazy Larry.message_2: I'm so lazy, I don't move from my chair often!!
Lazy Larry.message_3: Heavens to Betsy, I'm so lazy!!

Coach McGuirk.message_1: I said put that cheese on me.
Coach McGuirk.message_3: And I'll race! To feel the wind in my face!

Billy Mitchell.message_2: My favorite thing to do is cheat at video games.
Billy Mitchell.message_3: Do you know what I like? Suing people who say I cheated.
Billy Mitchell.message_4: My name is Billy Mitchell, and I cheated at both Donkey Kong and Pac-Man. Both of my records are fake, and I lie through my teeth in every interview I give.
